page.title: 03HOUSING IN THE LOCAL AREA
page.content: The majority of the houses in the area were built by the council before World War II. These houses are now being modernised which includes the installation of full central heating and the rewiring of the houses. The tenants of these homes are now being given the opportunity to buy the houses they now live in. In this area thr are four large private housing estates. Other private houses can be found throughout the area. The age of these houses can vary from about 150 years to modern kit houses which are just being built. In one of the six villages there are blocks of three_storey flats. These have become run down and are now in a serious state of disrepair.
